content: leaving a tail approx 51 cm / 20 in long and proceed to fnishing instructions 2 seed stitch dishcloth using c2 cast on 37 sts row 1 k1 p1 to 1 stitch before end of row k1 work row 1 a total of 58 times or until dishcloth measures approx 18 cm / 7 in long or desired length bind off all sts leaving a tail approx 51 cm / 20 in long and proceed to fnishing instructions 3 checkerboard dishcloth using c3 cast on 36 sts row 1-2 k row 3 k6 p4 k4 to 6 sts before end p4 k2 work row 3 a total of 6 times row 9 k2 p4 k4 to 2 sts before end k2 work row 9 a total of 6 times repeat the last 12 row 6 repeats of row 3 followed by 6 repeats of row 9 a total of 3 more times row 51-52 k bind off all sts leaving a tail approx 51 cm / 20 in long and proceed to fnishing instructions © alanna penk 2021 4 stripey dishcloth using c3 cast on 36 sts row 1-2 k in c3 row 3-4 k in c1 when working these thin stripes there s no need to cut either strand of yarn simply carry them up the side while working in the other colour work row 1-4 a total of 14 times or desired length row 57-58 k in c3 bind off all sts leaving a tail approx 51 cm / 20 in long and proceed to fnishing instructions 5 triangles dishcloth using c1 cast on 2 sts row 1 k2 row 2 kfb k1 stitch count= 3 row 3 kfb k2 stitch count= 4 row 4 k row 5 k1 kfb twice k1 stitch count= 6 row 6 k row 7 k1 kfb k to 2 sts before end kfb k1 2 sts increased row 8 k work row 7 and 8 a total of 20 times 40 row current stitch count 46 cut c1 and join c2 row 47 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end k2tog k1 2 sts decreased row 48 k work row 47 and 48 a total of 20 times 6 sts remain row 87 k1 ssk k2tog k1 stitch count= 4 row 88 k row 89 ssk k2tog then slip frst stitch over second stitch and pull tail through fnal stitch to fnish leaving a tail approx 51 cm / 20 in long and proceed to fnishing instructions © alanna penk 2021 6 woven ribbons dishcloth using c3 cast on 37 sts row 1-5 k row 6 k2 p to 2 sts before end k2 introduce c2 but do not cut c3 row 7 using c2 k2 sl 1 wyib k3 to 3 sts before end sl 1 wyib k2 row 8 using c2 k2 sl 1 wyif k3 to 3 sts before end sl 1 wyif k2 row 9 using c3 k row 10 using c3 k2 p to 2 sts
